statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); node_version=$(node --version 2>/dev/null | sed 's/v//' || echo ''); printf "\033[36m%s@%s\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[0m" "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$current_dir")"; if [ ! -z "$git_branch" ]; then printf " \033[35m⎇ %s\033[0m" "$git_branch"; fi; if [ ! -z "$node_version" ]; then printf " \033[32m⬢ %s\033[0m" "$node_version"; fi; printf " | \033[33m%s\033[0m | \033[37m%s\033[0m" "$model_name" "$(date +%H:%M:%S)"
